BackPressure.description: Back pressure is the melt-pressure against the screw movement during dosage

CavityPressureMaximum.description: Maximum pressure during the injection process in the cavity or mould

CushionVolume.description: Material volume remained in front of the screw after injection and holding pressure

DecompressionVolumeAfterPlastification.description: Decompression after plastification is the movement of the screw in the opposite direction to injection

DecompressionVolumeBeforePlastification.description: Decompression before plastification is the movement of the screw in the opposite direction to injection

DosingTime.description: Time to melt-up the plastic granulates and feed the melt for the next injection shot to the front of the screw

HoldHydraulicPressureAverage.description: Average holding pressure in the hydraulic cylinder

HoldHydraulicPressureMaximum.description: Maximum holding pressure in the hydraulic cylinder

HoldSpecificPressureAverage.description: Average holding pressure in front of the screw

HoldSpecificPressureMaximum.description: Maximum holding pressure in front of the screw

HydraulicPressureMaximum.description: Maximum pressure in the hydraulic cylinder

InjectionTime.description: Time required to fill the cavity or mould

PlastificationCircumferentialSpeedAverag.description: Average screw circumferential speed for plastification (e.g. mm/s)

PlastificationCircumferentialSpeedMaximu.description: Maximum screw circumferential speed for plastification (e.g. mm/s)

PlastificationRotationalSpeedAverage.description: Average plastification speed of the injection unit (RPM)

PlastificationRotationalSpeedMaximum.description: Maximum plastification speed of the injection unit (RPM)

PlastificationSpecificPressureAverage.description: Average plastification pressure in front of the screw tip

PlastificationSpecificPressureMaximum.description: Maximum plastification pressure in front of the screw tip

PlastificationVolume.description: Volume dosed by the machine for the next injection shot

SpecificPressureMaximum.description: Pressure in front of the screw tip

TransferCavityPressure.description: Cavity pressure in the mould during switch-over to the holding pressure

TransferHydraulicPressure.description: Hydraulic pressure in the cylinder during switch-over to the holding pressure

TransferSpecificPressure.description: Pressure in front of the screw tip during switch-over to the holding pressure

TransferStroke.description: Switch-over point to the holding pressure via stroke

TransferVolume.description: Switch-over point to the holding pressure via volume

VPChangeOverPosition.description: Screw position at switching between injection (V) and holding pressure (P)

BarrelId.description: Id (e.g. serial number) of the barrel

InProduction.description: information if the injection unit is used in the current running production

IsPresent.description: Information if the injection unit is physically installed on the injection machines

MaxScrewStroke.description: maximum stroke of the screw installed in the injection unit

ScrewDiameter.description: diameter of the screw installed in the injection unit

ScrewId.description: Id of the screw installed in the injection unit

ScrewVolume.description: volume of the screw installed in the injection unit
